para.text: A registered nurse or licensed practical nurse working in a methadone clinic licensed by the Maryland Department of Health may dispense methadone in accordance with:
The methadone clinic's policies and procedures for dispensing methadone; and
State and federal laws and regulations for labeling.
A registered nurse or licensed practical nurse working in a methadone clinic licensed by the Maryland Department of Health shall dispense methadone:
With any required patient information documents.

A registered nurse or licensed practical nurse working in a methadone clinic licensed by the Maryland Department of Health shall maintain records of methadone dispensed in accordance with the provisions of Health-General Article, Title 4, Subtitle 3, Annotated Code of Maryland.
A registered nurse or licensed practical nurse may not delegate the dispensing of methadone.

annotations.annotation: Health Occupations Article, §§8-205(a)(1) and 8-511, Annotated Code of Maryland
